page.title: 05WHERE I LIVE _ GOLDSITHNEY
page.content: I LIVE IN A VILLAGE CALLED GOLDSITHNEY.MY ADDRESS IS 94 ST.AUBYNS ESTATE.THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF HOUSES ON THE ESTATE,PLUS TWENTY-SIX OLD PEOPLES BUNGALOWS. IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE TWO PUBS,A SMALL POST OFFICE AND A NEW CHAPEL THAT WILL OPEN ON THE 28TH APRIL 1985.THERE IS A VILLAGE HALL WHERE SPORTS AND OTHER ACTIVITIES TAKE PLACE.THE VILLAGE HAS A CRICKET TEAM. ALTHOUGH WE ARE NEAR THE SEA WE ARE IN THE COUNTRY.ALL AROUND US ARE FIELDS.IN SOME OF THEM CABBAGES, FLOWERS,AND CAULIFLOWERS ARE GROWN.THE NEAREST TOWN IS PENZANCE WHICH IS FIVE MILES TO THE WEST.BEING SURROUNDED BY FARMLAND THE MAIN INDUSTRY IS AGRICULTURE. MY SCHOOL IS AT ST.HILARY WHICH IS ONE MILE AWAY.
